column3: str

<UIForeground>F201FC</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FD</UIGlow> Quest Sync<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>
The brusque Loporrit has a mind to do something dangerous, and has clearly heard of your proclivity for recklessness...
Speak with the brusque Loporrit.
Investigate the Allagan relic.
Return to the brusque Loporrit, and defeat any enemies that attack.
Speak with the brusque Loporrit.
Deliver the systems cube to the brusque Loporrit.
I hear you have a penchant for excitement and adventure, is that correct?
Then I assume in your travels you have doubtless heard tales of the Allagans.
What will you say?
The Allagans? Don't get me started.
Yes, and nearly everything wrong with the world seems to be their fault.
I thought as much.
I ask because I have plans to survey an Allagan relic not far from here. The weapons guarding it, however, make it too dangerous for me to go alone.
I trust you see where this is going. So, are you interested in a little adventure?
Much obliged. Now, let's be off. No time to waste.
The crash site is just ahead. If you find anything that may prove useful, I'd be grateful if you could retrieve it for me.
Onward, then. Er... After you.
Large, isn't it? I wonder what secrets it holds...
This bit of Allagan technology is certainly fascinating. A shame it's too bulky to carry back...
This apparatus is offline, but appears to be transportable. You place it in your ambiguously sized bag...
Phew. A moment longer and that drone would have alerted more...
Now, did you find anything of interest?
Oh? Let me have a look...
No, you're right. It must wait until we get back.
Safe at last. Now, show me what you found.
This... This is an Allagan decryption unit.
With it, we could read Allagan tomestones about history, science, poetry... If we had any, which we do not. An adventure for another day, I suppose.
Nevertheless, I'm deeply excited by the prospect─as I'm sure you can tell. You have my heartfelt gratitude.
